title: Increases penalties and requires imprisonment for leaving the scene of an incident without reporting; presumption of avoiding prosecution for DUI
summary: Increases penalties and requires imprisonment for leaving the scene of an incident without reporting; creates a presumption of avoiding prosecution for DUI when leaving the scene of an incident without reporting within four hours of consuming an alcoholic beverage.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to increasing penalties and requiring imprisonment for leaving the scene of an incident without reporting
